thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 48 of 7354
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: It's possible to find items a little cheaper then B&H when buying online. However, the extra few dollars that it might cost to buy through B&H are well justified. The online experience is second to none and on the one occasion I returned an item it was a seamless process. As far as I'm concerned if B&H stocks an item I'm interested in, I won't even consider looking elsewhere.
